meanings.sent1: The spaceship traveled through space at hypervelocities.
meanings.sent2: The car raced down the highway at hypervelocities.
meanings.sent3: The cheetah's hypervelocities made it impossible for the tortoise to keep up.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts moved at hypervelocities, jumping from one idea to the next.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster reached hypervelocities, thrilling all the riders.

meanings.definition: The state of moving at a very fast pace.
meanings.sent1: The athlete sprinted with hypervelocities towards the finish line.
meanings.sent2: The river flowed with hypervelocities after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent3: The hypervelocities of the ants marching in a line amazed the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to pass with hypervelocities during the exciting game.
meanings.sent5: The wind carried the kite with hypervelocities across the sky.

meanings.definition: The quality of being accelerated to a rapid rate.
meanings.sent1: The hypervelocities of the train made the passengers feel like they were flying.
meanings.sent2: The growth of the plant seemed to happen at hypervelocities under the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The hypervelocities of the water boiling in the pot surprised the chef.
meanings.sent4: His heart raced with hypervelocities as he approached the stage to give a speech.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the room increased with hypervelocities as the concert began.
